statements: DELETE FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE time_to_fill < 30 AND cost_per_hire > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE candidate_conversion_rate >= 0.5 OR time_to_fill >= 60;
DELETE FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Hiring Time';
DELETE FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'Time to Hire';
DELETE FROM recruitment_strategies WHERE cost > 500 AND time_to_fill < 30;
DELETE FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE time_to_fill > 30 AND cost_per_hire < 2000;
DELETE FROM recruitment_metrics WHERE time_to_fill > 30 AND cost_per_hire < 5000;
DELETE FROM recruitment_data WHERE strategy_id = 5 AND time_to_fill_days < 30;
